page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: THE FOLLOWING MEMBERS OF CARDROSS S.W.R.I. COMPILED THIS ENTRY OF DOMESDAY: MRS. PAT CAMPBELL, MRS. MARGARET DUNCAN, MRS. PAT MCCASH. THANKS ALSO TO MRS. MARGARET REID <PHOTOGRAPHS>, MRS. FLORA LECKIE, GORDON DUNCAN, RICHARD CAMPBELL AND KENNETH CROCKER. { { A FAREWELL FROM CARDROSS. WE HAVE MADE OUR CONTRIBUTION TO DOMESDAY '85, ASKING QUESTIONS, DOING SURVEYS, HOW MANY PEOPLE ARE ALIVE? WE HAVE LOOKED AT HOW WE TRAVEL, WHAT WE EAT AND WHAT WE DRINK, WE'VE TALKED OF NUCLEAR BASES - WHAT DO PEOPLE REALLY THINK? WELL, IT'S OVER AND IT'S DONE WITH, WITH MUCH SWEAT AND BLOOD AND TEARS. WILL PEOPLE REALLY READ ALL THIS IN ANOTHER THOUSAND YEARS?
